English: to marry and live with the bride's family (inverting traditional Chinese expectations)

d.f: `舊時~`稱~`男子~`至~`女~`方家~`裡~`結婚~`並~`居住~`下來~。`即~`入贅~。`如~：「`堂堂~`男子漢大丈夫~，`怎~`好意思~`做~`這~`倒插門~`的~`女婿~？」`也~`作~「`倒踏門~」。

English: to marry and live with the bride's family (inverting traditional Chinese expectations)
